Title: Rescue of mentally ill persons a challenge for volunteers
Content: On receiving a phone call from the public, two days ago, Collector K. Veera Raghava Rao personally intervened in rescuing an abandoned mentally challenged woman and admitted her to Government Rajaji H
Author: Staff Reporter
Description: On receiving a phone call from the public, two days ago, Collector K. Veera Raghava Rao personally intervened in rescuing an abandoned mentally challenged woman and admitted her to Government Rajaji H
